translated: The Book of Conditional Relations🔽The Chapter on the Opposite of Ideas
The Chapter on the Triad with the Threefold Root

original: Nosaññojanaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nanosaññojanaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)🔽Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava.🔽Noganthaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nooghaṁ …pe… noyogaṁ …pe… nonīvaraṇaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: no saññojanam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca pe na no saññojanam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca  hetuyāḥ nava pe vipāke ekam pe avigate nava  nogantham na kusalam dhammam paṭicca pe no ogham pe no yogam pe no nīvaraṇa saṅkhitta hetuyā nava pe vipāke ekam pe avigate nava
translated: With a non-inconstant unprofitable idea as condition there is … With a non-inconstant unprofitable idea as condition there is … (Abbreviated.)🔽With nine as root-cause … With one as kamma-result … With nine as object … With nine as condition by way of object.🔽With a non-fetter unprofitable idea as condition … With a non-bond … With a non-enslavement … With a non-hindrance … (Abbreviated.) With nine as root-cause … With one as kamma-result … With nine as object … With nine as condition by way of object.

original: Noparāmāsaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: na uparāmāsam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā pañca pe vipāke ekam pe avigate pañca
translated: With a non-clinging unprofitable idea as condition … (Abbreviated.) With five as root-cause … With one as kamma-result … With five as object … With five as condition by way of object.
